name: 陳紅章
objective:
本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.
schedule:
Week 1-2: Introduction to Technical Paper Writing
 Understanding the importance of technical paper writing
 Exploring various types of technical papers

Week 3-4: Defining the Research and Establishing Objectives
 Formulating clear research questions and objectives
 Conducting a comprehensive literature review
 Identifying research gaps and contributions

Week 5-6: Writing a Solid Introduction
Developing a clear problem statement
Outlining the paper's structure and organization

Week 7-8: Writing the Methodology Section
Describing research design and methodology
Explaining data collection and analysis methods

Week 9 : Midterm Exams 

Week 10-11: Presenting Results and Analysis
Effectively displaying data using graphs, charts, and tables
Interpreting results logically and objectively


Week 12-13: Writing Discussion 
Summarizing key findings and implications
Addressing limitations and suggesting future work

Week 13-14: Enhancing Clarity and Coherence
Improving sentence structure and word choice
Ensuring logical flow between paragraphs and sections

Week 15: Citations and Referencing

Week 16: Peer Review and Feedback
Exchanging papers for peer review
Providing constructive feedback and suggestions

Week 17: Finalizing and Proofreading
Reviewing and editing the final draft
Ensuring proper formatting and consistency

Week 18: Final Group Presentations
scorePolicy:
Weekly writing assignments: 30%
Midterm test: 30%
Final presentation: 40%
materials:
Title: "Writing Science: How to Write Papers That Get Cited and Proposals That Get Funded" Author: Joshua Schimel
Title: "Technical Writing: Process and Product" Authors: Sharon Gerson and Steven M. Gerson
